xwikidoc.content: == Bienvenue sur l'outil de pilotage des démarches administratives == {{include document="Demarches.Code.Macros"/}} {{velocity}} (% class="row" %) ((( {{block title="Démarches administratives" image="" top-height="100" link-height="400" image-width="50" image-height="50" top-bgcolor="#384285" link-bgcolor="black" classes="col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6"}} #foreach($item in $ministereList) * [[${item}>>Ministeres.${item}]] #end #foreach($item in $directionList) * [[${item}>>Directions.${item}]] #end #set ($demarchesListPage = $xwiki.getDocument('Demarches.WebHome').URL + "#|t=demarches&statut=active$directionFilter") * Toutes les Demarches * [[Ministères>>Ministeres.WebHome]] * [[Directions>>Directions.WebHome]] * [[Publics>>Publics.WebHome]] * [[Evénements>>Evenements.WebHome]] * [[Avis>>wikidemarches:Avis.WebHome||target="_blank"]] * [[Demandes>>wikidemarches:Demandes.WebHome||target="_blank"]] {{/block}} ))){{/velocity}}
